entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -8.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snow over northern sections. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
